description: Digital payment processing platform for real-time transactions, fraud detection, and multi-currency support

characteristics.name: Availability
characteristics.reason: Financial transactions must be available 24/7 globally - downtime = revenue loss

characteristics.name: Performance
characteristics.targetDescription: Real-time payment processing with sub-second response
characteristics.reason: Payment delays cause transaction abandonment and poor user experience

characteristics.name: Scalability
characteristics.target: Process 100,000 TPS (transactions per second), scale to 1M TPS
characteristics.targetDescription: Handle Black Friday peaks and viral product launches
characteristics.reason: Payment volume can spike 100x during flash sales

characteristics.name: Security
characteristics.target: PCI-DSS Level 1, SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, zero breaches
characteristics.targetDescription: Military-grade security for financial data and transactions
characteristics.reason: Data breach: $150-$200 per compromised record, regulatory fines, reputation damage

characteristics.name: Reliability
characteristics.target: Transaction success rate 99.99%, zero data loss
characteristics.targetDescription: Every transaction must be processed correctly or safely failed
characteristics.reason: Financial data loss or corruption has severe legal and financial consequences

characteristics.name: Fault Tolerance
characteristics.targetDescription: Continue processing transactions during infrastructure failures
characteristics.reason: Single point of failure unacceptable for financial transactions

characteristics.name: Recoverability
characteristics.targetDescription: Point-in-time recovery, continuous backup, transaction replay
characteristics.reason: Financial data cannot be lost - regulatory and legal requirements

characteristics.name: Maintainability
characteristics.target: Code quality > 90%, zero critical bugs in production
characteristics.targetDescription: Highly maintainable code for regulated financial environment
characteristics.reason: Financial software requires rigorous quality and audit trails

characteristics.name: Testability
characteristics.target: 95% code coverage, comprehensive financial test scenarios
characteristics.targetDescription: Test all edge cases, regulatory scenarios, fraud patterns
characteristics.reason: Financial software bugs can cause significant monetary loss

characteristics.name: Deployability
characteristics.target: Daily deployments with zero-downtime, instant rollback
characteristics.targetDescription: Canary deployments, feature flags, blue-green deployment
characteristics.reason: Need rapid feature delivery while maintaining stability

characteristics.name: Configurability
characteristics.target: Runtime configuration for fraud rules, rate limits, fees
characteristics.targetDescription: Adjust fraud detection, pricing, limits without deployment
characteristics.reason: Fraud patterns and business rules change dynamically

characteristics.name: Extensibility
characteristics.target: Plugin architecture for payment methods and currencies
characteristics.targetDescription: Add new payment providers, cryptocurrencies without core changes
characteristics.reason: Payment landscape evolves rapidly (new methods, regulations)

characteristics.name: Interoperability
characteristics.target: ISO 20022, SWIFT, SEPA, ACH, card network compliance
characteristics.targetDescription: Integrate with global payment networks and banking systems
characteristics.reason: Financial industry requires standards compliance for interoperability

characteristics.name: Usability
characteristics.target: Payment completion rate > 95%, intuitive merchant dashboard
characteristics.targetDescription: Simple integration for developers, clear UX for end users
characteristics.reason: Complex payment flows cause cart abandonment

keyScenarios.description: Process payment transaction in < 100ms with 99.99% success rate
Real-time fraud analysis without impacting transaction latency
Process multi-currency payment across international payment networks
Automatic failover to backup region with zero transaction loss
Demonstrate compliance with all audit trails and documentation
Handle 100x normal transaction volume without degradation

encryption.keyManagement: HSM (Hardware Security Module) for key storage

dataClassification.critical: Payment card data (PAN, CVV), bank account numbers
